baseline_texts: This frame shows a bed covered with a blanket that has a pastel color scheme with patterns in shades of pink, green, and orange. The bed is positioned against a plain light-colored wall, and a door is visible to the right side. The room appears simple and minimally decorated. The left side of the frame includes a partial view of an indistinct object or person, slightly blurred.

The image shows a table covered with a multicolored cloth featuring orange and yellow floral patterns. On the table is a small, blurred object that appears to be in motion, creating a sense of movement or a rolling effect. A hand is visible on the left side of the image, suggesting a person might have just tossed or moved the object. In the background, there is a closed door with a red piece of cloth hanging on it. The surroundings seem to be a small indoor room with plain walls.

This image shows a small dog or puppy with a light-colored coat on a bed. The dog appears to be running or moving quickly across the bed, causing a slight blur due to motion. The bedspread has a floral pattern with shades of yellow, orange, and pink. In the background, there is a door and a small portion of the wall visible. The overall setting appears to be a bedroom.

The frame shows a small, blurry object in mid-air above a bed covered with a floral-patterned bedspread. The bedspread has a mix of pastel colors such as pink, orange, and green, with a more prominent pink and orange section towards the head of the bed. The background wall is plain and light-colored, and there is a door on the right side with some clothes or fabric hanging on it. The overall scene appears to be inside a simple bedroom.

This image shows a bed with a floral-patterned bedspread in shades of yellow, pink, and peach. On the bed, there is a single white sneaker facing slightly to the left. The room has plain off-white or light-colored walls, and in the background, there is a closed door. Some dark and red-colored items, possibly clothes or bags, are hanging or draped near the door. The overall setting appears to be a simple bedroom.

This frame shows a single silver sneaker with white soles placed on a bed. The bedspread has a floral pattern with orange, yellow, and pink shades. The background includes a light-colored wall and a door or closet with some hanging clothes partially visible. The overall setting appears to be a simple bedroom.

The image shows a bed with a colorful bedspread featuring orange, green, and pink hues with a floral or abstract pattern. On the bed, there is a single metallic silver sneaker facing forward. In the background, part of a door is visible with some clothes hanging on hooks on it. The wall behind the bed is plain, and the room appears to be simply furnished.

The image shows a single silver sneaker placed on a bed with a colorful floral bedspread. The bedspread features pastel shades, predominantly pink and orange. The background includes a light-colored wall and a door, with some dark and red clothing items hanging on hooks or pegs attached to the door. The room appears simple and tidy.
diff_texts: Initial frame. No previous frame to compare.
In the current frame, a hand has appeared and is moving a silver tube-like object quickly across the bed, causing a motion blur effect on the object.
The main object, which appears to be a tube, has moved from lying flat on the bed to being in the air with its cap open and a white substance being squeezed out.
The main object, a shoe, has moved forward and is now closer to the edge of the bed compared to its previous position.
The object on the bed has moved forward and is now clearly identifiable as a white shoe.
The shoe moved slightly forward and tilted upward in the current frame compared to the previous one.
The shoe has tilted backward slightly, with its heel lifting off the bed surface.
The shoe has slightly shifted forward and turned a bit to the right on the bed.
